tournaments.title: League of Legends Tournament
tournaments.name: League of Legends Tournament
tournaments.detail: Join the League of Legends Tournament hosted by Twitch. You must be in a group of 5 to join this tournament.

tournaments.title: Team Fight Tactics Tournament
tournaments.name: Team Fight Tactics Tournament
tournaments.detail: Join the Team Fight Tactics Tournament hosted by Red Bull. We are only accepting 40 people

tournaments.title: Dota2 Tournament
tournaments.name: Dota2 Tournament
tournaments.detail: Join the Dota2 Tournament hosted by Digital Tournaments. You must be in a group of 5 to join this tournament.

friends.title: Leauge of Legends
friends.name: Leauge of Legends
friends.detail: Create new friends by playing League of Legends(LOL) with new people. LOL is a free to play online battle arena video game. The game contains 2 teams of 5 players each with unqiue heros. To win the game, the 1 team must destroy the other team's base.

friends.title: Team Fight Tactics
friends.name: Team Fight Tactics
friends.detail: Create new friends by playing Team Fight Tactics(TFT) with new people. TFT is a free to play online chess game. The game contains collecting strong champions and placing them on a board. Last player to survive wins.

friends.title: Genshin Impact
friends.name: Genshin Impact
friends.detail: Create new friends by playing Genshin Impact with new people. Genshin Impact is a free to play open world RPG game. Meet new friends, fight some epic monster, collect characters, and travel around the world.
